hero.title: The Best Dental Clinic You Can Trust.
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class dental care with our team of experienced professionals. We provide comprehensive dental services in a comfortable, modern environment.

about.title: We Care About You
about.description: At Dentocare, we believe in providing comprehensive dental care that goes beyond just treating symptoms. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to helping you achieve optimal oral health through personalized treatment plans and preventive care.

benefits.title: Complete Dental Care
benefits.description: Preventive, restorative & cosmetic care under one roof.

benefits.title: Emergency Care
benefits.description: Same‑day pain relief and urgent treatments.

benefits.title: Comfort‑First
benefits.description: Gentle, patient‑centered approach for all ages.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care for you and your family
services.description: Dental or oral health is concerned with your teeth, gums, and mouth. We offer a wide range of services to meet all your dental needs.

items.title: Dental Checkup & Cleaning
items.description: Regular dental checkups and professional cleaning to maintain optimal oral health and prevent dental problems.

items.title: Dental Fillings
items.description: Restore damaged teeth with modern, durable fillings that match your natural tooth color and provide long-lasting protection.

items.title: Root Canal Therapy
items.description: Save severely damaged or infected teeth with advanced root canal treatment in a comfortable, pain-free environment.

items.title: Dental Implants
items.description: Replace missing teeth with natural-looking dental implants that provide permanent, stable solutions for a complete smile.

items.title: Teeth Whitening
items.description: Achieve a brighter, more confident smile with professional teeth whitening treatments that deliver noticeable results.

items.title: Invisalign Clear Aligners
items.description: Straighten your teeth discreetly with custom-made clear aligners that are comfortable, removable, and virtually invisible.

appointment.title: Have a Question? Request a Call Back
appointment.subtitle: Leave your details and a brief query. Our team will call you back shortly.

doctors.title: Our Dental Care Specialist
doctors.subtitle: Meet our experienced, friendly, and caring medical team

items.name: Dr. Abhijit Baroi
items.bio: Dr. Abhijit Baroi has over 15 years of experience in general dentistry. He specializes in preventive care and patient education.

items.name: Dr. Abhijit Baroi
items.bio: Dr. Abhijit Baroi is a certified orthodontist with expertise in braces, Invisalign, and other orthodontic treatments.

items.name: Dr. Abhijit Baroi
items.bio: Dr. Abhijit Baroi specializes in children's dental care, making dental visits fun and comfortable for young patients.

items.name: Dr. Abhijit Baroi
items.bio: Dr. Abhijit Baroi is an experienced oral surgeon specializing in complex dental procedures and implant surgery.

testimonials.title: Reviews From Our Patients
testimonials.subtitle: We believe that honest feedback is essential for improving experiences and outcomes.

items.name: Jennifer Martinez
items.message: Dr. Baroi and his team are absolutely amazing! They made my dental experience comfortable and pain-free. The modern equipment and friendly staff made all the difference.

items.name: Robert Chen
items.message: I was nervous about getting dental implants, but Dr. Baroi explained everything clearly and the procedure was smooth. My new smile looks natural and feels great!

items.name: Amanda Thompson
items.message: The Invisalign treatment with Dr. Baroi exceeded my expectations. The results are incredible and the process was so convenient. Highly recommend!

items.name: Marcus Rodriguez
items.message: Emergency dental care when I needed it most. The team was professional, caring, and got me out of pain quickly. Thank you!

items.name: Lisa Park
items.message: Dr. Abhijit is wonderful with children. My kids actually look forward to their dental visits now. The office is kid-friendly and the staff is patient and kind.

items.name: Thomas Wilson
items.message: Professional teeth whitening gave me the confidence boost I needed. The results are amazing and the process was comfortable. Great experience overall!

footer.description: Your trusted partner for comprehensive dental care. We provide modern, comfortable, and effective dental services for the whole family.
